thread.title: Weinstein to surrender on sex assault charges

title: Weinstein to surrender on sex assault charges
text:
Weinstein to surrender on sex assault charges 2:59am IST - 01:00
Disgraced movie mogul Harvey Weinstein is expected to turn himself into the NYPD Friday on charges of sexual misconduct following a months-long investigation, including by the Manhattan district attorney's office. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Disgraced movie mogul Harvey Weinstein is expected to turn himself into the NYPD Friday on charges of sexual misconduct following a months-long investigation, including by the Manhattan district attorney's office.
